info.title: Product Details
info.description: The Barclays Product Details API allows users to discover various financial products Barclays offers. From personal accounts to SME lending products, business current accounts to commercial credit cards, users can view current product details.

get.description: Lists all Barclays Business Current Accounts products

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Used for conditional request, to retrieve data only if modified since a given date.

schema.description: Used for conditional request, to retrieve data only if modified since a given date.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Used for conditional request, to retrieve data only if the given Etag value does not match.

schema.description: Used for conditional request, to retrieve data only if the given Etag value does not match.

head.description: Gets header information on Business Current Account objects.
